review: This is our first experience without cable, and the Fire TV Stick is making it a smooth transition.  (I should caveat that statement by saying that we don't watch too much TV in the first place, just a few specific channels.)  We can download apps that let us watch HGTV, ESPN, TBS, TNT, and other channels; we can listen to music via multiple apps and programs; we can move the Fire Stick between rooms and devices... all in all, it's FANTASTIC!

review: Purchased when Roku started to go on fritz. I'd been planning to purchase since I am already a Prime member and wanted access to instant streaming account on tv. HBOGO was anticipated bonus.Overall, product meets expectations. Set up was easy. Navigation may be a bit unwieldy if members of your household aren't tech savvy. (Sometimes recently used apps like Netflix and Hulu don't load from most immediate menu and you have to scroll down to apps menu instead.) The remote works just fine and is better quality than some I've seen for comparably priced boxes.The only drawback: I was unable to access HBOGO. App downloads and operates, but I guess Amazon still has yet to iron out differences with some cable providers (Comcast Xfinity).
